description: NTS Map: 082P07Horseshoe Canyon in the Red Deer River Badlands has a number of easy walking trails that provide and interesting walk through geological history. It's open scenery very different from the usual Alberta mountain hike.It's about a 60 meter descent into the canyon. There are a number of visible trailsGPS data is for one trail there are a number of options so you don't have to follow this route.
directions: At the Horseshoe Canyon recreation area on Highway 9, 17 km SW of Drumheller. From the parking area you can find several options to descend into canyon and select a trail
title: Horseshoe Canyon
